scripts.migration:generate: pnpm run build && tsx node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:generate -d dist/data-source.js
scripts.migration:run: pnpm run build && tsx node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:run -d dist/data-source.js
scripts.migration:revert: pnpm run build && tsx node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:revert -d dist/data-source.js
scripts.migration:show: pnpm run build && tsx node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:show -d dist/data-source.js
